kit.leader_skill: "Movie Bosses" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%

super_attack.name: Gigantic Strike (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Fight to Survive
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 260% up; (Forever) Attacks are effective against all Types; (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 160% up; Damage reduction rate 40% up; When attacking with 2 or more Ki Spheres obtained: DEF 100% up; Damage reduction rate 20% up; Disables the enemy's guard; When attacking with 6 or more Ki Spheres obtained: ATK 100% up; Launches an additional Super Attack; If the target enemy's HP is 80% or less when attacking: ATK & DEF 50% up; High chance of performing a critical hit; If the target enemy's HP is 50% or less when attacking: ATK & DEF 50% up; Launches an additional Super Attack; After delivering a final blow: Fully recovers HP at the end of turn

lines.text: Attacks are effective against all Types
Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres

lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki
When attacking with 12 or more Ki
When attacking with 2 or more Ki Spheres obtained
When attacking with 2 or more Ki Spheres obtained

If the target enemy's HP is 80% or less when attacking

lines.context: After delivering a final blow
